history.narrative: Law 6-173, the “State Energy Plans Submission Requirement Act of 1986,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-402, which was referred to the Committee on Public Service and Cable Television. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 23, 1986 and October 7, 1986, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 30, 1986, it was assigned Act No. 6-222 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
